snippet: So, Stan Wawrinka was asked, were you aware that in the long history of the French Open, no defending champion ever had lost in the first round?...
lead_paragraph: So, Stan Wawrinka was asked, were you aware that in the long history of the French Open, no defending champion ever had lost in the first round?

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Can Chuckle After Avoiding Historic Loss in Paris
headline.main: Wawrinka Can Chuckle After Avoiding Historic Loss in Paris
